alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:32PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Okeechobee, Indian River, southeastern Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grant-Valkaria to near Blue Cypress Lake to 6 miles north of Sebring Regional Airport. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Fellsmere and Indian River Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
